starwars.entities

Class Force

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Entity
      • starwars.SWEntity
        • starwars.entities.Force
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityInterface, SWEntityInterface

    public class Force
extends SWEntity
    An entity that has the FORCE attribute and so can be used to MindControl others, TrainForce and use force entities.
    Author:
    croft1
    See Also:
    starwars.actions.TrainForce}, starwars.entities.LightSaber}

    • Constructor Detail

      • Force

        public Force(MessageRenderer m,
             int power)
        Constructor for the Blaster class. This constructor will,
        • Initialize the message renderer for the Force
        • Set the short description of this Force to "the Force"
        • Set the long description of this Force to "A mysterious presence can be felt"
        • Set the strength point of the Force to 0
        • Add a Take affordance to this Blaster so it can be taken
        • Add a MIND_CONTROL Capability to this FORCE so it can be used to MIND CONTROL
        Parameters:
        m - MessageRenderer to display messages.
        See Also:
        starwars.actions.Take}, starwars.Capability}
